title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Audit trail showing "AI agent" vs human actor". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Ability to transition from discovery facts to explicit share request". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
